ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.2_0: At that time a lay follower had built a dwelling for the Sangha.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.3_0: He wanted to give out-of-season robe-cloth to both Sanghas at the presentation ceremony for that dwelling,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.4_0: At that time the robe-making procedure was ready for the Sangha.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.5_0: That lay follower then went to the Sangha and asked them to end the robe-making season.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.7_0: After giving a teaching, the Buddha addressed the monks:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.8_0: “Monks, I allow you to end the robe-making season.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.9_0: And it should be done like this.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.10_0: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.11_0: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.12_0: If it seems appropriate to the Sangha, the Sangha should end the robe-making season.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.14_0: Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.15_0: The Sangha ends the robe-making season.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.16_0: Any monk who approves of ending the robe-making season should remain silent.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.17_0: Any monk who doesn’t agree should speak up.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.18_0: The Sangha has made an end of the robe-making season. The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I will remember it thus.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.1_0: That lay follower then went to the Sangha of nuns and asked them to end the robe-making season.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.2_0: Because they had done the robe-making procedure, the nun Thullanandā
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.3_0: But the nun Thullanandā, aiming to get robe-cloth for herself, blocked the Sangha from doing it.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.4_0: Then that lay follower complained and criticized him,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.5_0: “How can the nuns not end the robe-making season for us?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.6_0: The nuns heard the complaints of that lay follower.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.7_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.8_0: “How could Venerable Thullanandā block a legitimate ending of the robe-making season?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.9_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.12_0: “... How could the nun Thullanandā do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.13_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.14_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.15.1_0: ‘If a nun blocks a legitimate ending of the robe-making season, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:2.1.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:2.1.5_0: A legitimate ending of the robe-making season:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:2.1.6_0: a unanimous Sangha of nuns brings it to an end.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:2.1.8_0: if she blocks it with the thought, “What can be done so that the robe-making season doesn’t end?”, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:2.1.9.1_0: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, and she perceives it as such, and she blocks it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:2.1.10_0: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but she is unsure of it, and she blocks it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:2.1.11_0: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but she perceives it as illegitimate, and she blocks it, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:2.1.12_0: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but she perceives it as legitimate, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:2.1.13_0: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:2.1.14_0: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, and she perceives it as such, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:2.2.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:2.2.2_0: if she blocks it after demonstrating a benefit;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:2.2.4_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:2.2.5_0: The tenth training rule is finished.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:2.2.6_0: The third sub-chapter on nakedness is finished.
